Data

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.Notebook

  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Data representation of a Notebook. Tracks the DOM, decrypts Entries and PDFs.
    Author:
    Hirsch Singhal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Notebook(java.io.File f)
      Loads a Notebook from a File.
      Notebook(java.io.File f, java.lang.String t, java.lang.String author, boolean encrypted, javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
      Creates a new Notebook

      java.util.ArrayList<PDFWrapper> getPDFs()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notebook

        public Notebook(java.io.File f,
        java.lang.String t,
        java.lang.String author,
        boolean encrypted,
        javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Creates a new Notebook
        Parameters:
        f - File location of the Notebook. Generated using the title.
        t - Title of the Notebook.
        author - Name or concatentated names of authors.
        encrypted - true if encrypted.
        key - Encrypt/decrypt key. Null for unencrypted Notebooks.

      • Notebook

        public Notebook(java.io.File f)
         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Loads a Notebook from a File. Prompts for a password if needed. Decrypts Entries and PDFs if needed.
        Parameters:
        f - File to load the Notebook from.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - Provided password was incorrect.

    • Method Detail

      • newEntry

        public Entry newEntry(java.lang.String title)
        Creates a new Entry, stores it in the DOM, adds it to the entryList. Increments maxSerial.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the Entry.
        Returns:
        The created Entry.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Saves the DOM to the file provided in the constructor.
        Returns:
        Success or failure of save operation.

      • getEntries

        public java.util.ArrayList<Entry> getEntries()
        Returns:
        List of Entrys in the Notebook.

      • addPDF

        public void addPDF(java.io.File file)
        Using a provided File, creates a PDFWrapper and adds it to the DOM.
        Parameters:
        file - Location of the .pdf file.

      • getPDFs

        public java.util.ArrayList<PDFWrapper> getPDFs()
        Returns:
        List of PDFWrapper in the Notebook.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns:
        Title of the Notebook.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String t)
        Sets the title of the Notebook. Changing the title resets the PassCheck field in the DOM. Does not force a save.
        Parameters:
        t - new Title.

      • removeData

        public void removeData(DataStorage data)
        Removes a provided DataStorage form the DOM and applicable lists.
        Parameters:
        data - Object to remove.
